QuestData.Title: Talbuk Training: Rakkiri
QuestData.Description: Now that your talbuk has got a taste for combat, let's take it out into an environment it may not be familiar with.$B$BThe icy bluffs of Frostfire Ridge should be a good test. Find yourself a big, mean beast out there and take it down with your talbuk.
QuestData.LogDescription: Defeat Rakkiri while riding your Talbuk-In-Training.
